Operation 'runtimeconfig.operations.delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on required input (operation name parameter) and output (empty response). Added explicit parameter and response details to improve AI agent understanding of what inputs are needed and what to expect in return.

data.current_description: Deletes a long-running operation. This method indicates that the client is no longer interested in the operation result. It does not cancel the operation. If the server doesn't support this method, it returns `google.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED`.
data.description_suggestion: Deletes a long-running operation by name, indicating the client is no longer interested in the operation result. This method does not cancel the operation; use the cancel method to request cancellation. Requires the operation name as input. Returns an empty response on success. If the server doesn't support this method, it returns `google.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED`.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on required input (operation name parameter) and output (empty response). Added explicit parameter and response details to improve AI agent understanding of what inputs are needed and what to expect in return.

message: Operation 'runtimeconfig.operations.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description is too vague about inputs (what filters are available) and outputs (what is returned). Added details about pagination support, filter parameters, and response structure to help AI agents understand how to construct requests and interpret responses.

data.current_description: Lists operations that match the specified filter in the request. If the server doesn't support this method, it returns `UNIMPLEMENTED`.
data.description_suggestion: Lists long-running operations that match the specified filter criteria. Accepts filter parameters including name prefix, page size, and page token for pagination. Returns a ListOperationsResponse containing matching operations and a next page token if additional results exist. If the server doesn't support this method, it returns `google.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED`.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too vague about inputs (what filters are available) and outputs (what is returned). Added details about pagination support, filter parameters, and response structure to help AI agents understand how to construct requests and interpret responses.

message: Operation 'runtimeconfig.operations.cancel' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on required inputs (operation name parameter and CancelOperationRequest body) and output (empty response). Reorganized to clarify inputs, outputs, and state transitions for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Starts asynchronous cancellation on a long-running operation. The server makes a best effort to cancel the operation, but success is not guaranteed. If the server doesn't support this method, it returns `google.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED`. Clients can use Operations.GetOperation or other methods to check whether the cancellation succeeded or whether the operation completed despite cancellation. On successful cancellation, the operation is not deleted; instead, it becomes an operation with an Operation.error value with a google.rpc.Status.code of `1`, corresponding to `Code.CANCELLED`.
data.summary_suggestion: Request cancellation of a long-running operation
data.description_suggestion: Requests asynchronous cancellation of a long-running operation by name. The server makes a best effort to cancel but success is not guaranteed. Requires the operation name and an optional CancelOperationRequest body. Returns an empty response. The operation is not deleted on cancellation; instead, it transitions to a cancelled state with Operation.error containing a google.rpc.Status.code of `1` (Code.CANCELLED). Use GetOperation to verify cancellation status. If the server doesn't support this method, it returns `google.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED`.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on required inputs (operation name parameter and CancelOperationRequest body) and output (empty response). Reorganized to clarify inputs, outputs, and state transitions for better AI agent interpretability.
